The Ramblings of a Developer.

Jamstack Virtual Conf

I'll be making my first appearance at a major conference this month, talking about two things that I'm very passionate about: Jamstack and Diabetes.

Mon May 18 2020

Managing Diabetes with JAMstack

Diabetes is a disease that unfortunately isn't going away anytime soon. Whilst technological advancements are making a huge difference to the way diabetes is treated, the technology isn't accessible to everyone. I plan to do something about this by developing an accessible and open source JAMstack app to help diabetics manage the disease.

Thu Jan 30 2020

About Me

Hey! My name is Jamie Bradley. I am the founder of Endeavour Digital and a Lead Front End Engineer. I live near a town called Middlesbrough and I enjoy playing squash.
